author: IGN
description: Take a look at gameplay from Warfactory in this trailer for the upcoming automation-driven RTS where every unit is built on the factory floor. Warfactory fuses planet-scale automation with real-time strategy and lite 4X elements. Build sprawling factories, design modular robot armies, and lead thousands of units into battle. Conquer a galaxy with a supply chain — one conveyor belt at a time. Warfactory will be available on PC in 2026, and players can request access to enter closed alpha playtesting via Steam this week.
title: Warfactory - Official Gameplay Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description: James Cameron made waves with recent comments suggesting Avatar: Fire and Ash could be the final installment of the planned five-film franchise, depending on its box office performance. Cameron, along with Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldaña, Sigourney Weaver, and the rest of his cast explain how Fire and Ash continues to expand and invest in the world of Pandora, even with the future of the series in question.
title: "I'm In Denial" | Avatar: Fire and Ash Sets Up Exciting Sequels That May Not Get Made

author: IGN
description:
Multiversal storytelling may be all the rage now, but Stephen King has been connecting the worlds of his fiction for decades now. With It: Welcome to Derry, the King multiverse (or macroverse, as he calls it) gets its most robust representation onscreen since the days of Hulu's Castle Rock. With Dick Hallorann a major part of the story, The Shining and its sequel Doctor Sleep are very well-accounted for, but It's cosmological origins and the depth to which Welcome to Derry explores them also open the esoteric, floating door to hints about the world of The Dark Tower, the King saga around which all his other stories revolve.

#IGN
title: It: Welcome to Derry: Every Major Stephen King Reference & Easter Egg Explained

author: IGN
description:
The Druid as a bear in the Path of Exile 2 endgame is extremely fun. Layer on some auras, quickly build up some rage, then nearly endlessly stomp your way around the maps. With stellar clear speed and excellent single target damage, the Shaman Druid is a must-try for players looking to ease their way through maps and bosses.

#IGN #gaming
title: Path of Exile 2: 10 Minutes of Stompy Bear Druid Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
January may be the calm before the storm, but 2026 still kicks off with a packed lineup of new releases, updates, and expansions across every platform. In this video, we break down the biggest games coming in January 2026, from co-op adventures and RPGs to horror, anime adaptations, surprise DLC drops, and major next-gen upgrades. Whether you’re looking for something brand new to play or a reason to revisit an old favorite, here’s what’s worth paying attention to as the new year begins.
 
This IGN monthly release roundup covers January 2026 video game releases on PS5, Xbox Series X|S, Switch, Switch 2, PC, mobile, and VR. Highlights include new RPGs, indie standouts, major free updates, early access launches, and expansions like Cult of the Lamb: Woolhaven, Animal Crossing: New Horizons’ Switch 2 upgrade, FF7 Remake Intergrade on new platforms, and more. If you want to know what games are coming out in January 2026, this is your complete guide to the month ahead.

Timecodes:
00:00 Int
title: The Biggest Game Releases of January 2026

author: IGN
description:
Avatar: Fire and Ash gets it's very own companion game with the Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora expansion, From the Ashes. Shortly after the release of the third entry into James Camerons sci-fi franchise, Ubisoft has released the lastest expansion meant to work along side the new film. Here are the opening minutes of Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora: From the Ashes.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Avatar: From the Ashes Expansion Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Osquio is the dark counterpart to Esquie and the final boss of the new Verso’s Drafts region added to Expedition 33 as part of the Thank You Update. This fight is a lengthy, multi-phase battle that heavily tests your parry timing, patience, and ability to read attack patterns. In this guide, we break down exactly where to find Osquio, every attack in both phases, and how to survive his most dangerous moves, including Spin Spin, Drop Kick, and Destroy the World.

We’ll also cover the best overall strategies for taking Osquio down, including recommended team composition, Lumina, and survivability tips if you’re not running a nuke build. Whether you’re aiming to beat Osquio fairly or just want to understand the fight before diving in, this guide walks you through everything you need to know to defeat Expedition 33’s toughest new boss and claim his rewards.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 | Osquio Boss Guide: How to Win the Final Verso’s Drafts Fight

author: IGN
description:
After years of fan requests, Blizzard has finally added the much beloved Paladin class to Diablo 4. If you pre-purchase the Diablo 4: Lord of Hatred expansion, you'll gain immediate access to the Paladin class in Season 11. A few days into the season, we got our Paladin character to a spot where it tears through all enemies in glorious Holy Light. Here's 15 minutes of Paladin Gameplay in Diablo 4 Season 11: Season of Divine Intervention.

For build information, check out Chronikz build guide over on Maxroll: https://maxroll.gg/d4/build-guides/judgement-paladin-guide

#IGN #Gaming
title: Diablo 4: Paladin Class Endgame Gameplay
